https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yCj34aMsDvdInM1j8k2R5iLuQn1.jpg Long-term couple Simon and Jason, along with daddy-ish Cooper and his boy du jour, escape to a mountain cabin for a three-day weekend away from their hectic city lives. Looking to spice up this long-standing tradition, they add a special twist to this years retreat - each of them must invite one attractive single friend to their mountain getaway. 3-Day Weekend
